short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens up a panel which displays LeetCode users you follow. Follow friends to see their real-time statistics, all in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to "follow" LeetCode users. Once you add a user, they will remain in the LeetFriends panel until you remove them. Whenever you open the panel, you will see their most updated statistics. LeetFriends has its own interface in the toolbar-- it will not modify your LeetCode view.

LeetFriends also allows you to receive push notifications when a friend makes a submission! Toggle the bell button on a friend to enable notifications for that user.

This add-on is not affiliated with LeetCode.
